system
Class Communicator

java.lang.Object
  system.Communicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Communicator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class aggregates messages which are meant to be other machines at the end of a superstep. This reduces the number of RMI class destined to any machine in the cluster.

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam
